text:
Image zoom Courtesy Khloe Kardashian

Penelope Disick is 4! Kourtney Kardashian and Scott Disick‘s only daughter hits a milestone today, and while we’re already expecting the pint-sized cutie to spend her day playing with cousin North West, we’re also reminiscing about how far Penelope has come since making her debut on Keeping Up with the Kardashians. Not only is the 4-year-old stylish, but she’s also the epitome of cool.

In honor of the toddler’s big day, we rounded up all the times Princess P made us feel inferior – because, after all, it’s Penelope’s world and we all just live in it.

She makes it look easy.

Oh, you know, NBD.

Hardly a competition.

But to be honest, it’s almost impossible for Penelope to not look adorable.

“No shade – just remember, I’m the boss.”

They see her rollin’.

She needs the fuel to keep posing for photos, obvi.

Be strong, Penelope. Be. Strong.

Also, note the fish gape pose.

Not that the 4-year-old is in need of any beauty rest.

She squeezed some bonding time into her busy schedule.

Anything to get her best angle.

“Girl, please.”

Because smiling causes wrinkles.

It’s almost as sweet as the birthday girl herself.

Like a true rock star.

“‘Slumber’ all the way, mom.”

And advised her mom on the proper way to strike a pose.

Can you smell what P is cookin’?

“Out of the way, peasants.”

So brave.

a.k.a. the most important life lesson of all.

Happy 4th birthday, Penelope!
title: 22 Times Birthday Girl Penelope Disick Was Cooler Than All of Us
